name: .DIT File Extension
summary: Learn about .DIT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Directory information tree (DIT) file used by Active Directory, a directory service for computers and networks; saves a hierarchy of network objects and access permissions; named ntds.dit by default.

content: NOTE: Active Directory is included with Windows Server products.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
